price: ߓߊ߬ߙߌ߬ ߌ ߞߵߌ ߞߊߘߊ߲߫ ߢߊ-ߊ-ߢߊ߫ ߸ ߡߐ߱ ߝߊ߲߬ߓߊ ߕߍߣߊ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߟߊߒߠߦߊߓߊ߯ ߟߎ߫ ߘߌ߫
arabic: وَمَآ أَكۡثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَوۡ حَرَصۡتَ بِمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wamā aktharu al-nāsi walaw ḥaraṣta bimu'minīna
